title: Guide to Toxic Asian Players and Why They Think They Are The Best

embed.description: OCE is famous for being one of the most toxic League of Legends regions, but there are a subgroup of players that have ascended the levels of toxicity beyond what was thought humanely capable. The question is, why are these players so toxic? What drives them to insult people or AFK from one death?

body: Well, just wanted to give some insight on what's in the mind of these guys.
